experience.title: Student Teacher
responsibilities: Developed and delivered comprehensive lesson plans for 10th-grade World History and 11th-grade US History classes.
Utilized classroom management strategies to maintain a productive and safe learning environment for 30+ students per session.
Collaborated with mentor teachers to design assessments and analyze student performance data to adjust instruction.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
responsibilities: Provided academic support to students in small group settings to reinforce core concepts in Social Studies.
Assisted in the grading of homework, quizzes, and exams while maintaining confidentiality and accurate records.
Supported the lead teacher in implementing individualized education programs (IEPs) for students with special needs.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
